Pengamat Sebut Jokowi Bisa Reshuffle demi 'Jatah' Pendukung
02 Nov 2019, 13:17 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Pengamat menyebut Jokowi sangat mungkin melakukan reshuffle dalam enam bulan ke depan demi memenuhi 'jatah' pendukung yang mengantre masuk kabinet. (CNN Indonesia/ Adhi Wicaksono)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Presiden Joko Widodo dinilai sangat mungkin mengganti sejumlah menteri atau reshuffleÂ Kabinet Indonesia Maju dalam enam bulan ke depan. Selain kinerja, peluang untuk mengganti para menteri juga didasari kepentingan pemenuhan 'jatah' pihak yang mendukung Jokowi."Cukup terbuka Jokowi reshuffle kabinet 6 bulan hingga setahun ke depan. Dasarnya kinerja atau polemik yang ditimbulkan menteri. Selain itu mungkin juga karena banyak pendukung Jokowi yang antre ingin masuk kabinet," ujar Direktur Eksekutif Parameter Politik Adi Prayitno kepada CNNIndonesia.com, Sabtu (2/11).Pernyataan soal kemungkinan reshuffle kabinet ini sebelumnya disampaikan Ketua Majelis Permusyawaratan Rakyat (MPR) Bambang Soesatyo.Meski tak memperinci alasan soal reshuffle kabinet, namun menurut Bamsoet, sapaannya, Jokowi perlu menambah menteri perempuan dalam kabinet.Jika dibandingkan dengan menteri perempuan dalam Kabinet Kerja periode 2014-2019, jumlah menteri perempuan dalam kabinet saat ini lebih sedikit.Adi menuturkan, berkaca pada perombakan kabinet di periode pertama, saat itu Jokowi melakukan reshuffle dalam waktu 10 bulan. Terdapat lima posisi menteri yang diganti yakni Menko Perekonomian, Menteri Bappenas, Menko Kemaritiman, Menko Polhukam, dan Menteri Perdagangan.Menurutnya, sangat mungkin Jokowi kembali merombak kabinet dalam kurun waktu kurang dari setahun pada periode kedua ini."Dulu kan juga reshuffle dalam 10 bulan. Bisa jadi kembali dilakukan karena ada sejumlah menteri yang tak sesuai latar belakang keahliannya," kata Adi.Senada, pengamat politik Universitas Padjajaran Firman Manan mengatakan, perombakan kabinet sangat mungkin dilakukan Jokowi dalam waktu enam bulan ke depan. Terlebih, sejak awal pelantikan menteri Kabinet Indonesia Maju, Jokowi telah mengingatkan tak akan segan mencopot menterinya yang tak bekerja dengan serius."Di awal juga presiden sudah bilang, kalau tidak baik akan dicopot. Kalau kemudian menteri-menteri out of perform, ada kemungkinan diganti," ucapnya.Selain itu, penggantian menteri bisa jadi dilakukan karena terjadi perubahan format koalisi pendukung Jokowi. Pada periode pertama, terjadi perubahan Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) yang semula mendukung Jokowi. Perubahan ini berdampak pada pengunduran diri kader Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) Asman Abnur sebagai Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparatur Negara Reformasi Birokrasi.Kendati demikian, Firman menilai kecil kemungkinan terjadi perubahan format koalisi mengingat dukungan partai pendukung Jokowi saat ini terbilang cukup 'gemuk' setelah Gerindra bergabung."Saya tidak melihat kemungkinan reshuffle karena kebutuhan partai. Itu sudah cukup berimbang, kecuali memang terjadi perubahan format koalisi," tuturnya. (pris/stu)

Observers Call Jokowi Can Reshuffle for the Support 'Ration'
02 Nov 2019, 13:17 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Observers say Jokowi is very likely to do a reshuffle in the next six months in order to meet the 'quota' supporters who lined up to enter the cabinet. (CNN Indonesia / Adhi Wicaksono)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - President Joko Widodo is considered to be very likely to replace a number of ministers or to reshuffle the Indonesian Cabinet Forward in the next six months. In addition to performance, the opportunity to replace the ministers is also based on the interests of fulfilling the 'quota' of those who support Jokowi. "Jokowi is quite open to reshuffling the cabinet 6 months to a year ahead. queued to enter the cabinet, "Executive Director of Political Parameters Adi Prayitno told CNNIndonesia.com, Saturday (2/11). The statement about the possibility of a cabinet reshuffle was previously made by the Chairman of the People's Consultative Assembly (MPR) Bambang Soesatyo.Meski did not specify the reasons for the cabinet reshuffle , but according to Bamsoet, his greeting, Jokowi needs to add women ministers in the cabinet. If compared to women ministers in the Working Cabinet for the 2014-2019 period, the number of female ministers in the cabinet is currently less. Jokowi's reshuffle within 10 months. There were five ministerial positions that were replaced, namely the Coordinating Minister for the Economy, the Minister of National Development Planning Agency, the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs, the Coordinating Minister for Politics and Security, and the Minister of Trade. "It could be done again because there are a number of ministers who do not match their background expertise," said Adi. Moreover, since the beginning of the inauguration of the Indonesian Cabinet ministers, Jokowi has warned not to be reluctant to remove his ministers who do not work seriously. "At the beginning also the president had said, if it is not good it will be removed. "He said. In addition, the replacement of ministers could be done because there was a change in the format of Jokowi's supporters coalition. In the first period, there was a change in the National Mandate Party (PAN) which originally supported Jokowi. This change has an impact on the resignation of the National Mandate Party (PAN) cadre Asman Abnur as Minister of Empowerment of the Bureaucratic Reform State. "I don't see the possibility of a reshuffle because of the needs of the party. That is already quite balanced, unless there is a change in the format of the coalition," he said. (pris / stu)
